
## UyghurScript dialog

> source code [dialog.c](../../uyghur/externals/dialog.c)
---

### 1. inform

> 📝:  inform func of dialog module

> 🔙: Empty

> 🛒: 
* dialogTitle  `CString`
* messageContent  `CString`


### 2. confirm

> 📝:  confirm func of dialog module

> 🔙: Boolean

> 🛒: 
* dialogTitle  `CString`
* messageContent  `CString`


### 3. input

> 📝:  input func of dialog module

> 🔙: String

> 🛒: 
* dialogTitle  `CString`
* defaultText  `CString`


### 4. select_save

> 📝:  select_save func of dialog module

> 🔙: String

> 🛒: 
* dialogTitle  `CString`
* defaultPath  `CString`
* filterRule  `CString`


### 5. select_open

> 📝:  select_open func of dialog module

> 🔙: String

> 🛒: 
* dialogTitle  `CString`
* defaultPath  `CString`
* filterRule  `CString`


### 6. select_folder

> 📝:  select_folder func of dialog module

> 🔙: String

> 🛒: 
* dialogTitle  `CString`
* defaultPath  `CString`


### 7. select_color

> 📝:  select_color func of dialog module

> 🔙: String

> 🛒: 
* dialogTitle  `CString`
* defaultColor  `CString`
